name: Spirits of Summerland (Summerlander Games)
description:
A 3D cozy game where you find yourself roaming the Summerlands, for an unknown reason. Exploring to find out what is happening and what is making all the spirits drawn to the Summerlands.

 As a wandering spirit, you must take up the task of becoming a temporary grim reaper and help other wandering spirits from remaining trapped in the Summerland. Travel across the many areas each spirit roams and discover the cause of the disturbance, and aid in their transition to the other side.

Look forward to new editions as this game continues to be updated.

Thank you for visiting, and look forward for more content and title in development
